alert.note: Alert for Hemphill (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 19 at 7:09AM CDT until May 19 at 3:08PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Texas... Canadian River at Canadian 2NE affecting Hemphill County. For the Canadian River...including Canadian 2NE...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Canadian River at Canadian 2NE. * WHEN...From this morning to late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding of farm and ranch land occurs. No significant damage expected to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 2.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.0 feet late this morning. - Action stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 315 PM CDT.
